org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
Interface IAeCompensationCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeActivityCompensateImpl, AeCoordinatorCompensationHandler, AeParticipantCompensator, AeProcessCompensationCallbackWrapper
public interface IAeCompensationCallback

Interface for the invoker of a scope's compensation method. Provides a callback method for the scope to invoke when the compensation is complete.

Method Summary
 void compensationComplete(AeCompensationHandler aCompHandler)
          Called by the scope when its compensation is complete.
 void compensationCompleteWithFault(AeCompensationHandler aCompHandler, IAeFault aFault)
          Called by the scope when its compensation was interrupted by a fault.
 void compensationTerminated(AeCompensationHandler aCompHandler)
          Callback method that indicates the compensationHandler has been terminated.
 java.lang.String getCoordinationId()
          Returns the coordinationId if this is a coordinated comp info.
 java.lang.String getLocationPath()
          Returns the location path for the callback object.
 boolean isCoordinated()
          Returns true if this is a coordinated comp info.

getLocationPath

public java.lang.String getLocationPath()
Returns the location path for the callback object. This will be used to identify the callback object in the event that the process is asked to persist itself.

isCoordinated

public boolean isCoordinated()
Returns true if this is a coordinated comp info. This is normally used during saving and restoring state information.

Returns:
true if this is a coordinated comp info.

getCoordinationId

public java.lang.String getCoordinationId()
Returns the coordinationId if this is a coordinated comp info. This information is normally used during state save/restore procedures.

Returns:
the coordinationId if this is a coordinated comp info.
